shortdesc.ph: Occurs when there's an error during the local video mixing.

p.codeblock: public void onLocalVideoTranscoderError( LocalTranscoderConfiguration.TranscodingVideoStream stream, int error) {}
public virtual void OnLocalVideoTranscoderError(TranscodingVideoStream stream, VIDEO_TRANSCODER_ERROR error){}

section.title: Details
section.p: When you fail to call or , the SDK triggers this callback to report the reason.

plentry.pd: The video streams that cannot be mixed during video mixing. See .
The reason for local video mixing error. See .

The reason for local video mixing error:
1: The selected video source has not started video capture. You need to create a video track for it and start video capture.
2: The video source type is invalid. You need to re-specify the supported video source type.
3: The image path is invalid. You need to re-specify the correct image path.
4: The image format is invalid. Make sure the image format is one of PNG, JPEG, or GIF.
5: The video encoding resolution after video mixing is invalid.
20: Unknown internal error.
